welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hayward, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant cultural scene, and diverse culinary offerings. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this unique city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse is a steakhouse located in Union City.

restaurants.name: In-N-Out Burger
restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Union City.

restaurants.name: Chef's Experience China Bistro
restaurants.description: Chef's Experience China Bistro is a chinese restaurant located in Hayward.
restaurants.address: 22436 Foothill Blvd (at A St), Hayward, CA 94541

restaurants.name: Niles Pie Company
restaurants.description: Niles Pie Company is a bakery located in Union City.
restaurants.address: 32990 Alvarado Niles Rd Ste 960 (Dowe Street), Union City, CA 94587

restaurants.name: Mexico Tipico
restaurants.description: Mexico Tipico is a mexican restaurant located in Union City.
restaurants.address: 33121 Alvarado Niles Rd, Union City, CA 94587

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Palo Alto Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Carlos Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Carlos Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Limited free wifi access is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Mineta San Jose International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport serves both commercial and private aviation.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Reid-Hillview Airport is exclusively for private aviation and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
